description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.lOFiXND3aZpKcVbL]{Arcane Gate}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.WMH1rwmvCkVTo0iJ]{Blur}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.dA0KBMHpvnks9SEo]{Energy Devourer}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.v8Zpkt1iu4yP7Jew]{Mass Resistance}
